resources.string: Press next once you are in the start position.
Please step into the centre line.
Please step down.
Step back to start position and report back perceived excursion number.
Step excursion %1$d
Recording task is completed. Please hand back the tablet to the therapist.

Picture of stepping down on the board.
Setting
Wait while the AMEDA moves into position ..
Test Paused
Press Done when you are ready to resume the test.
Are you sure?
Do you really want to abort this test?
Unable to run a test at this time.
"Unable to save your response to the database. Please try again.
Error updating test during abort operation. You will not be able to resume this test.
There has been an error recording that this test is finished.
